The reason its called portal 2 is because of the TWO portals you get with the game, Valve DOUBLED the size of the original game and added a story which is cool for people that are causal gamers that have TWO many things to do because they just don't understand how good the SIGMA GAMER GRINDSET (SGG) is. This game shows you the way to enlightment and the ascension to places that are so profound that human languages can't describe the beauty of those places the only thing that comes close is the song third eye by the band tool. The game has the ability to make you into a demi god like hey zeus, Because you will have so much insight of the perceivable universe, The mass growth of knowledge that you will know is just breath taking. Im saying so much about a masterpiece like this that i forget to say that it helped my marriage, My wife hated me because i was a beta male which makes sense because my wife is so so so very very hot the reason she is, is because she is half Filipino and half latino. On a rainy day she told me that she and our TWO kids were going to leave me. My life was going down hill but she told me to stop being a beta cuck and be a man. She lefted me for dead, But by the grace of god this game changed my life around from being a beta to a god. Thank you god for this great game

much like its predecessor, Portal 2 is a fun, challenging and hilarious experience from beginning to end. the difficulty curve is about as close to perfect as a game can get, it's never so difficult to make you want to stop playing, but never so easy that it removes all enjoyment. Portal 2 makes you think, makes you laugh, and with its relatively short story it never over stays its welcome (not that it could if it tried).

however it's after you have finished the main game that the real fun begins.the community has done an amazing job keeping incredible maps coming year after year and while some are quite a bit more challenging than anything the base game offers there is something out there for everyone and more than enough to justify not only dozens, but even hundreds or potentially thousands of hours of fun. 

If you haven't tried the Portal series at all you've done yourself an enormous disservice especially when you can often get them both for a fraction of what they are worth. Portal 2 in nothing short of a masterpiece and you owe it to yourself to give it a play. 100/10

强烈推荐，几乎是从各个方面超越前作，一个解密FPS游戏竟然把剧情和人物设计做得这么绝，简直无敌。
关卡设计上有时缺少一代的灵气，确实从解密变成了找白墙，但是有了白色凝胶之后游戏的可玩性增强了很多。

Jogo muito bom, apanhei o numa promoção, mas mesmo assim o jogo é muito bom para o preço que é.
Achei a historia muito curta para o meu gosto, porém o multiplayer é a melhor parte do jogo, os mapas basicos são bons, mas os da workshop são ainda melhores. 
Dou 5 estrelas para este jogo

Portal 2...

I don't have words.

First of all yes, the price is worth it 100%.
But i would have been just fine even if it costed more. 
This game is probably my favorite game, and i given me many wonderful memories. The story line is very engaging and the puzzles are incredible. The feel and vibes it gives me (and many others) are warm, and have not been formed by any other games I have played so far. 

"This was a triumph
I'm making a note here:
Huge success.
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction. "

- Still Alive

P.S.: This review is for Portal 2, but it would be best to play the original first.
